experience.description: Provide personalized shopping experiences by identifying customer needs and suggesting complementary products. Maintain up-to-date knowledge of seasonal collections and store promotions while consistently exceeding monthly sales targets.

Assisted the outdoor gear department with technical product demonstrations and inventory management. Processed customer transactions and returns using the point-of-sale system during high-traffic summer periods.

metadata.experience_level: Prior internship/job experience(s) in the job field.
